desert_edge.description: You arrive at the edge of a vast golden desert. The wind carries whispers of forgotten songs.

items.name: Sand Cloak
items.description: A light cloak that protects you from the desert heat. Slightly increases attack by 3.

oasis.description: Palm trees surround a glimmering pool. The air is cool and refreshing here.

items.name: Healing Water
items.description: Water from the oasis that restores 30 HP.

dune_passage.description: Tall dunes surround you. The heat is blinding, and the ground shifts beneath your feet.

abandoned_camp.description: Torn tents and scattered pottery lie half-buried in sand. Someone fled in a hurry.

items.name: Scimitar
items.description: A curved blade from distant lands. Increases attack by 8.

ancient_gate.description: A colossal sandstone gate stands half-buried. Runes glow faintly on its surface.

sunken_ruins.description: Collapsed pillars and carvings of forgotten gods surround you. Sand trickles from the ceiling. A golden gate stands before half buried in teh sands.

items.name: Dagger of time
items.description:
A curved dagger forged in a tim long since passed. As you touch it you feel the power surge through you.
Increases attack by 15.

crystal_chamber.description: A radiant chamber hidden beneath the dunes. Crystals pulse with golden light around a sacred pedestal.

items.name: Sunstone Relic
items.description: A brilliant gemstone said to hold the desertâ€™s ancient power. It hums softly in your hands with an unnatural glow to it.
